name: One Button Warrior
description:
One Button Warrior is a small scale RPG where you control your character using only one Button.

How to Play:

Press a key on your keyboard to start the game. This key will become your action key.

Every encounter in the game offers you an action you can take by pressing your action key. 

If you don't want to take the action you are offered, wait for the timer to run out and the next encounter will begin.

The timer will get shorter with every encounter.

Try to successfully beat as many encounters as you can before your HP runs out or your corruption becomes to great.

Credits:

Music - John Leonard French

SFX - Universal Sound FX
